DOC.brief_summary: Comparison various method improve quality CPR
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Quality CPR Lay Rescuers With Without Feedback Devices
DOC.detailed_description: Even paramedic emergency physician , resuscitation patient cardiac arrest remain challenge . Previous study show cardiac output varies widely even among professional helper . This especially due different mean frequency cardiac compression wich vary 60 160/min paramedic . Aim study investigate whether use feedback-devices cardiac-pulmonary resuscitation ( CPR ) lead improvement cardiac output may improve survival . For , examine impact different feedback-methods frequence-variety manikin lay rescuer . Overall , compare three different device feedback CPR . The subject study lay rescuer perform 5 minute chest-compression-only CPR .
DOC.criteria: lay rescuer > 18 year < 60 year professional rescuer pregnancy
